<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk set category popularity"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/categories/bulk-popularity"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Bulk updates the popularity flags used to drive category suggestions and curated pickers for assets. Use it to mark many categories as popular/unpopular in one call, either by sending explicit CategoryIds or by using select-all plus filters in Request.

**Prerequisites**
1. **CategoryIds** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/categories/v2](/docs/api/categories/search-categories-v-2) to find category IDs and extract `Items[].CategoryId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search categories and capture IDs: [POST /api/v1.0/categories/v2](/docs/api/categories/search-categories-v-2).
2. [POST /api/v1.0/assets/categories/bulk-popularity](/docs/api/categories/bulk-set-category-popularity) with CategoryIds and an IsPopular map (or Request filters + IsSelectAll).

**Minimal Required Fields**: CategoryIds (or Request.Filters when using IsSelectAll) and IsPopular when setting per-category values.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
